description: Source code for a LitElement-based web component 'todo-footer' that renders the footer section of a TodoMVC app, including filters and clear completed button.

classes.name: TodoFooter
classes.description: Web component class for the Todo footer, managing display of item count, filters, and clear completed button.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the footer HTML including item count, filter links, and clear completed button.

methods.name: #onClearCompletedClick
methods.description: Handles click event to dispatch ClearCompletedEvent.
